thread.title: First Week Sales Projections For Future's New Album
thread.title_full: First Week Sales Projections For Future's New Album

author: Danny Schwartz
title: First Week Sales Projections For Future's New Album
text:
Home > Music > First Week Sales Projections For Future's New Album First Week Sales Projections For Future's New Album 0 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 20, 2017 at 10:27am Future will likely debut at #1. 
First week sales projections are in for Future's new self-titled album. HDD reports that the album will move 115-140K copies in the first week, with 60-75K coming from pure sales. For some perspective, EVOL sold 134K copies in its first week and DS2 sold 147K copies in its first week. 
FUTURE will almost certainly debut at #1. It includes zero features and production by Metro Boomin , DJ Spinz, Jake One, Zaytoven, Southside and more. Listen here .
